Package com.nookure.staff.api.manager

Class PlayerWrapperManager<T>

java.lang.Object
com.nookure.staff.api.manager.PlayerWrapperManager<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The player class of the player wrapper implementation (e.g. PlayerWrapper@Player or PlayerWrapper@ProxiedPlayer>) This is used to get the player wrapper by its player class. But you can also use the unique id of the player wrapper. see getPlayerWrapper(UUID)
public class PlayerWrapperManager<T> extends Object
Manages all the player wrappers.

You can get the instance of this class by injecting it, see Injector.getInstance(Class)

Since:
1.0.0
See Also:
  • for more information about player wrappers
  • for more information about staff players

    • addPlayerWrapper

      public void addPlayerWrapper(@NotNull T player, @NotNull @NotNull PlayerWrapper playerWrapper, boolean isStaff)
      Adds a player wrapper to the manager.
      Parameters:
      player - the player that will be used as a key
      playerWrapper - the player wrapper that will be used as a value
      isStaff - whether the player is a staff player or not

    • addPlayerWrapper

      playerWrapper - the player wrapper that will be used as a value
